home_videoDescr_status: <0>Current Status:</0> Eco is released in Early Access and available for purchase.
home_title: Build a Civilization in a Simulated Ecosystem.
home_description: Eco is an online game where players must collaborate to build a civilization
home_videoDescr_copy: with your fellow Citizens, complete with a government, economy, and culture. Work together to achieve society level goals, transforming the natural world while working to live in harmony with it. Eco is an online multiplayer game where players must collaborate to survive global threats, without creating one of their own in the process.
